    • Method Detail

      • resourceAsString

        public static String resourceAsString(String path)
                               throws IOException
        Utility method that loads a file content from the classpath. UTF-8 charset is used.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the classpath resource
        Returns:
        the content of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - when resource can't be read or doesn't exist

      • resourceAsString

        public static String resourceAsString(String path,
                                      Charset charset)
                               throws IOException
        Utility method that loads a file content from the classpath.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the classpath resource
        charset - the charset used for reading the file
        Returns:
        the content of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - when resource can't be read or doesn't exist

      • resource

        public static byte[] resource(String path)
                       throws IOException
        Utility method that loads a file content from the classpath.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the classpath resource
        Returns:
        the content of the file as byte array
        Throws:
        IOException - when resource can't be read or doesn't exist
